lines.text: Burns, are you an American citizen?
Sure! Do I look like a Persian?
Ever been married?
Not me! I'm America's sweetheart!
Ever been in jail?
No.
[Major stands up. Burns stands up and says an oath. Sits back down]
Well, Maje old kid... now I'm a Marine.
You're damned right you are! Stand up!
[Gestures for Burns to leave his office]
Terrible! Madden, put a uniform on this! Try to make it look human! Don't shoot him before we find out where his parents live.
Slick day, Grandpop!
Are you the Marine Corpse?
No! I'm the fellow who killed the Dead Sea!
I've roamed the world over and nowhere have I seen -...
I know... nowhere have you seen a girl like me.

[to the Marine barber]
Sheik style at the ears... and long and fluffy on top!

[At Reveille]
Come on, Snoring Bull... tomorrow has came!
What's the idea... do they think we're milkmen?
Say, Rip Van Winkle... this place ain't no rest cure!
This young man seems to have everything from galloping consumption to cold feet.
He's nuts... like all you Leather-necks!
Hello, Sweetie! Here's 'Little Me' waiting for 'Little You'!

[Referring to Burns]
Has that Boot been botherin' you?
It's all right... Marines will be Marines.
You've been promising to take me back to the Base every minute for the last three hours! I never knew anybody could drink so much ginger ale without popping.

[to Norma Dale]
Don't be dumb, darling... you won't be a chicken forever. You know, you ought to encourage me... I'm not hard to get.
I've met a lot of fresh ones in and out of the service... but he breaks all records.
He's fresh all right... but we'll salt him down!
But... I don't mean to get him in any trouble.
Don't worry! He don't need any help to get in trouble.
Sergeant, I've come to ask a favor of you. It's about Skeet Burns. I was a poor sport to have squealed on him. I'd hate to feel I've hindered his advancement. Won't you take him to sea with you?
This is no kindergarten! We've got to have discipline around here!
Please, Skeet... I want to talk to you. I'm sorry about the other night, Skeet. I hate a squealer as much as you do... - and I didn't want you to leave without knowing how I really feel, Skeet.
Gee, Norma... you're a peach! I'm nuts about you!
If I wasn't the punkest Marine in the Corps, I'd ask you something, Norma.
Say, Marine... you almost ran into a murder!
Peddle your papers, Handsome! I'm poison to Gobs!
And I'm a great cure for poison, Mr. Leather Neck!
Say, Baby... I think I'll declare war on you!
You'd better keep away from those floosies or O'Hara will put a permanent wave in your skull.
I'm givin' you birds final warnin'! I'll knock the block off the first man I catch with those goo-goo dames!
What's been buzzin' in your bonnet for the past week, Skeet?
The bandits are swarming the hills!
He say open doors or he break them down.
lines.character: Guard at Door of Besieged Clinic

lines.text: Tell him to go to hell!

[Pushing down a Chinese Bandit to the ground]
That's for all the punk Chop Suey I got in Omaha!

[Last words/Repeated line]
Who wants to quit drill for today and drive the General's car?
